Title: The Cabin Show
Plot: Michael learns that it's actually George Sr.'s twin brother Oscar serving time in prison, not George. After getting a tip from Barry, Michael heads to Reno to find George, but that costs him a camping trip he promised his son.
GuestStars: Justin Grant Wade, John Beard, Henry Winkler, Judy Greer, Blue Man Group, Gary Kraus, A. DeSantis Martin, Brandon Johnson, Paul Vogt, Jim Cramer
